entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2008/10. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population
entry.dcterms:creator: Hegedűs, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-H05: TÁRKI Omnibus 2008/10. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population. data sheet. Version: 2011-01-07

entry.dcterms:description: The blocks of the TÁRKI 2008/10. omnibus survey: 1; Political attitude. 2; Economy 3; Gender study 4; Attitudes towards the car insurance
entry.dcterms:subject: political institutions, public administration
mass political behavior, attitudes
gender and gender roles
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
face-to-face interview
